document.title: Technical Bulletins: Important Notice to Cities Operating School Systems: The Use of Revenue Sharing Funds Instead of Local Funds for Schools - The Effect on Future Allocations
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin called attention to an aspect of the 1976 amendment to the Revenue Sharing law of 1972, related to the use of revenue sharing funds instead of local funds for school operating expenses.
